overview: Turn your television into a soothing seascape and enjoy the tranquil effects of colorful fish swimming through calm blue water without the hassles of cleaning, feeding, and maintenance.  Offering the perfect way to relax, this program features footage of exotic fish in an undersea coral reef.  Choose your favorite music track -- classical, New Age or jazz -- and prepare to melt into a serene and peaceful island in the middle of your hectic life.
title: Aquarium
